title: Theresa May – 2019 Statement at Downing Street
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, at Downing Street on 16 January 2019.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)
